Text.Language: Amwini n~ten]w~ou: m~voou qen han'almoc: m~Maria ]ourw: nem Pivamwn pimarturoc.
Come today,Â / to glorify, with psalms,Â / Mary the queenÂ / and Piphamon the martyr.

Indeed, for the sake of Christ,Â / he rightly enduredÂ / sufferings in truth:Â / Piphamon the brave.

Hear us, have mercy on us,Â / and forgive our iniquitiesÂ / through the supplicationsÂ / of Saint Piphamon for us.

You were greatly exalted,Â / O Saint Piphamon,Â / for your purityÂ / and martyrdom.

Great is Your honorÂ / in heaven,Â / O Jesus, the King of Glory;Â / in Your name remember us.

O our God, disperseÂ / the enemies of the Church,Â / and deliver us from our enemiesÂ / through our lady the queen Mary.

We ask You to deliver our fathers,Â / the priests of the Lord,Â / along with the God-loversÂ / through the entreaties of the hero Piphamon.

Title.Language: Psali Watos for the Martyrdom of Saint Abe-Fam the Soldier

Text.Language: Al/ywc ]oi n~s~v/ri: ouoh aftwmt n~je panouc: aisancaji m~p~taio~ m~pijwri: kuri Pivamwn pigenneoc.
Truly, I am amazed,Â / and my mind is baffled,Â / when I utter the honor ofÂ / lord Piphamon, the strong hero.

Every highly exalted honorÂ / befits you, O martyr,Â / the famous struggle-mantled,Â / lord Piphamon.

Christians gather todayÂ / with psalms and hymnsÂ / in the land of EgyptÂ / for Piphamon the martyr.

â€œThe righteous cried out, and the LordÂ / answered them in their persecutions.â€?Â / Many were the hardships of the saint,Â / and the Lord delivered him out of them.

For many are the wondersÂ / performed before the peopleÂ / through the power of Christ the MightyÂ / by lord Piphamon the great.

Jesus Christ is in our midst today,Â / with the angelic chorusÂ / on the feast of the struggle-mantled,Â / lord Piphamon the martyr.

Also, our fathers the apostlesÂ / marveled at the sufferingsÂ / that the martyr accepted,Â / Piphamon the beloved of Christ.

Also, the righteous and the athletes,Â / the martyrs of Christ,Â / rejoice today with the asceticsÂ / for the strong, Piphamon the martyr.
